thread.title: Great location and price
thread.title_full: Great location and price - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 41Richie
title: Great location and price
text: Given the location with relatively good access to downtown NYC: Greenwich Village, SOHO, NOLITA, Chinatown, TRIBECA the Financial District, and two Little Italies, this hotel is an excellent choice, particularly at off season prices. And breakfast is included. For out of town folks travelling by car, parking could be difficult but the hotel has an arrangement with a garage although drivers might want to check out various parking apps that show a variety of garages as well as legal street parking locations for the duration of a visit.
